name: Six Million Dollar Arcade Turbo
description:
Six Million Dollar Arcade Turbo Description

Six Million Dollar Arcade Turbo is a 3D Platformer made with Irrlicht.

Find a way to the finish line. Use your gravity gun to reverse gravity. Your score is constantly decreasing, be fast ! You score decrease much faster when you use your torchlight, speed run it without light if you can !

Controls Move Shoot Use torchlight Reverse Gravity
